title: AbortSignal: any() static method
summary: The AbortSignal.any() static method takes an iterable of abort signals and returns an AbortSignal. The returned abort signal is aborted when any of the input iterable abort signals are aborted. The abort reason will be set to the reason of the first signal that is aborted. If any of the the given abort signals are already aborted then so will be the returned AbortSignal.
pageTitle: AbortSignal: any() static method - Web APIs | MDN
